articles.author: Jeremy Werner
articles.title: Illini tumble in AP Top 25 following crushing defeat at Indiana, open as home underdogs vs. USC - 247Sports
articles.description: Illinois barely remains in rankings after worst defeat of Bret Bielema era
articles.content: After a crushing 63-10 loss at Indiana, Illinois fell 14 spots to No. 23 in this week's AP Top 25. Illinois has been ranked for the first five polls of the season, reaching as high as No. 9 entering … [+3179 chars]
